item.title: Assignment 1
item.description: Upload your assignment to the Blackboard link for Assignments by DATE. Tasks Produce your own original examples of:a. a deductively valid, sound argumentb. a deductively valid argument which is not soundc. an inductively strong argumentd. a version of your answer to c which is even strongere. an argument which sounds a little plausible and might actually persuade someone not being careful about their reasoning, but which is neither deductively valid nor inductively strong
